Package com.l2h1.tamagotchi.model.states

Class State.HealthState

java.lang.Object
com.l2h1.tamagotchi.model.states.State
com.l2h1.tamagotchi.model.states.State.HealthState
Enclosing class:
State
public static class State.HealthState extends State
State representing the health of the entity. This class has an attribute that counts the number of pills the entity has taken in the session. One of the entity's deaths depends on this number (State.DeathType.OVERDOSE).

    • decreaseTick

      public void decreaseTick(int ticks)
      Description copied from class: State
      Represents how the state loses value with each tick. The state that implements this method can decide to multiply the specified number of ticks by a constant, or to customize the way it loses value with each tick.
      Specified by:
      decreaseTick in class State
      Parameters:
      ticks - the number of ticks to make the loss of value depend on the state

    • getCriticalType

      public State.CriticalType getCriticalType()
      Description copied from class: State
      Represents the State.CriticalType of state to be returned depending (or not) on its value.

      However, a state can only have one critical type at a time.

      Specified by:
